result.title: Weapon Plus
result.description:
"Weapon Plus." is the first, but a large and high-quality pack of mods that adds working weapons to the game. 

The pack includes:
• 6 unique weapons. 
• 3 Rifles. 
• 3 Shotguns. 
• 4 pistols. 
• 9 electric guns. 
• 6 Turrets. 
• 1 Automatic. 
• 5 PP. 
• 2 secret guns. 
• 2 wrist blasters. 
• 1 item with the authors of the pack. 


Total: 42 weapons. 
Each weapon is unique and fits the style of the game. 
( the soundtrack is also available. )

result.title: Weapon plus V2
result.description:
Weapon plus V2 is a continuation of the Weapon Plus pack. 

- The pack includes 58 different weapons. 

- In total, both packs will add 100 new weapons. (42 +58) 

- There are 25 guns in the pack, analogues of which exist in real life.

result.description:
Big pack of weapons from Block Strike!

The package contains:
• AK-47 Marshmall
• AK-47 Standard
• AK-47 Dissaray
• A1M1
• AUG Diablo (+ regular version)
• Ultrasound Enlix (+ regular version)
• USP Greendawn Pistol (+Neoplex skin, regular version)
• Gun Glock Galactik (+ skin Nezzle, normal version
• Five Seven Neo (+regular version)
• Pistol Beretta Imperial Dragon (+ regular version)

From melee weapons:
• Ke rambit Elite Coloring
• Karambit Over Flow
• Karambit Cristal Carruphion
• Katana Emerald (+ regular version)
• Ordinary knife Fake Gold (+ skin Opium, regular version)

Notes:

• Beautiful
• Weapons can shoot
• Weapons and knives can be picked up

result.title: Pack for realistic weapons
result.description:
Pack for realistic weapons!

The pack includes:
• AS VAL (+tuning version)
• VSS Vintorez
• SA-80 (+version with grenade launcher and calimator sight)
• OC-14 "Thunderstorm" (+tuning version and with a grenade launcher)
• FN F2000 (+ version without optical sight)
• HK 416 (+ tuning version)

Notes:
• Beautiful
• You can adjust the size using Resize
• Do not shoot
• Realistic
